SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class ChatController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.ChatController
public class ChatController extends Object
The ChatController class is responsible for managing the chat functionality in the GUI.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    javafx.scene.layout.VBox
    chatBox
    The VBox that contains the chat messages.

    readChat
    The ScrollPane used to display the chat messages.
    javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<String>
    recipientChoiceBox
    The recipientChoiceBox field represents a choice box for selecting the recipient of a chat message.
    javafx.scene.control.TextField
    writeMessage
    The TextField used for writing chat messages.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatController

      public ChatController()

  • Method Details

    • setRecipientName

      public void setRecipientName()
      Sets the recipient name and initializes the recipient choice box. Clears the write message field, populates the recipient choice box with available recipients, and sets the default recipient to "Everyone".

    • handleEnterPressed

      public void handleEnterPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the enter key is pressed in the write message field. Sends the entered message to the appropriate recipient (individual or everyone) and clears the write message field. If the entered message is empty, no action is performed.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the enter key press.

    • writeChatMessage

      public void writeChatMessage(String message, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Writes a chat message to the chat box with the specified color.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be displayed in the chat box.
      color - The color of the message.
